channel.title: Commands for my IP?
channel.description: Is there a way to make an command that i can do with only MINE ip? So i can do it on all acc's thats logged in with my ip/

item.title: Commands for my IP?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

the reaper77:

lol just make a really weird command that requires no player rights… nobody will be able to guess it

NEVER give players a slightest opportunity like that. If you mistype and it sends to everyone you are fucked. If someone guesses it, you guessed it, you’re fucked.
Rule of thumb: Never trust your players under ANY circumstance unless you know them in real life and you CAN trust them.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands for my IP?
item.dc:creator: @_Steven ©Steven©
item.description:
@_Steven wrote:

Posting this for

X blitz X…

Easy… add this to your server class

public static String connectIP;

and this to the run() method

connectIP = s.getInetAddress().getHostAddress();

then use it as this

        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("CMDNAME") && TestClass.connectIP.equalsIgnoreCase("127.0.0.1") || TestClass.connectIP.equalsIgnoreCase("REALIP"))
        {

        }

Read full topic
